snippet: Senator Rand Paul, a Republican whose restrained approach to military intervention has put him at odds with his party, demanded that TV stations stop playing an ad linking his position on Iran to President Obama’s.
abstract: Senator Rand Paul, a Republican whose restrained approach to military intervention has put him at odds with his party, demanded that TV stations stop playing an ad linking his position on Iran to President Obama’s.

headline.main: Rand Paul Demands TV Stations Pull Iran Ad
